title: Pokemon Universe
body:
Before the release of Detective Pikachu there is already a sequel in development. IGN had an interview with Legendary Entertainment producer Ali Mendes and they said that the universe of Pokemon is so large and rich that there are a lot of opportunity to create new stories and there are over 800 pokemon that could be deserving of their own screening time. This could be the start of a franchise of Pokemon movies in a era of Hollywood that loves cinematic universes. 

https://www.ign.com/articles/2019/03/18/pokemon-cinematic-universe-a-possibility-after-detective-pikachu

summary: I have no shame in admitting that I just got so happy and excited looking at all the box office predictions for how much money...
body:
I have no shame in admitting that I just got so happy and excited looking at all the box office predictions for how much money Detective Pikachu is going to make on it’s opening weekend that I cried a bit just now. That’s how excited I am for this movie.

Dear lord, let it be May aready.

summary: JAPANESE VOICE ACTORS FOR DETECTIVE PIKACHU REVEALED
title: JAPANESE VOICE ACTORS FOR DETECTIVE PIKACHU REVEALED
body:
Detective Pikachu launches in Japan a week before it does here in the states, which means our friends on the other side of the world will get first crack at the movie. Their version of the film will have a Japanese dub, and some of the cast handling that dubbing has been revealed.

- Ryoma Takeuchi will voice Tim Goodman
- Marie Iitoyo will voice Lucy Stevens
- Ken Watanabe, who plays Detective Yoshida in the movie, will dub over his character in Japanese

summary: DETECTIVE PIKACHU PRODUCTION DESIGNER EXPLAINS WHY THE FILM SHIES AWAY FROM USING GAME/ANIME LANDMARKS
title: DETECTIVE PIKACHU PRODUCTION DESIGNER EXPLAINS WHY THE FILM SHIES AWAY FROM USING GAME/ANIME LANDMARKS
body:
Detective Pikachu wants to take a very real approach to the world of Pokemon. For the team creating the movie, that meant staying away from direct-rips of locations and buildings from the Pokemon anime and games. Nigel Phelps, production designer on Detective Pikachu, fully explains the approach in the comment below.

“We’ve kind of shied away from [using landmarks and architecture from the games]. There are little clues with the street names, and stuff like that, there’s references to the Pokemon universe, without being specific to it. So we’ve shied away from the animation [because] the cartoons and stuff felt much too cartoon-y and unreal, and it was important to everyone making the film that this was a realistic universe.”

So we’ve shied away from the animation [because] the cartoons and stuff felt much too cartoon-y and unreal, and it was important to everyone making the film that this was a realistic universe.”

For the team creating the movie, that meant staying away from direct-rips of locations and buildings from the Pokemon anime and games. Nigel Phelps, production designer on Detective Pikachu, fully explains the approach in the comment below.

“We’ve kind of shied away from [using landmarks and architecture from the games]. There are little clues with the street names, and stuff like that, there’s references to the Pokemon universe, without being specific to it. So we’ve shied away from the animation [because] the cartoons and stuff felt much too cartoon-y and unreal, and it was important to everyone making the film that this was a realistic universe.”

summary: BOX OFFICE FORECAST OUTLET PREDICTS BIG OPENING FOR DETECTIVE PIKACHU
title: BOX OFFICE FORECAST OUTLET PREDICTS BIG OPENING FOR DETECTIVE PIKACHU
body:
Will Detective Pikachu be the first truly great video game movie? While we won’t know for sure until opening day, things certainly seem to be heading that way. It’ll be lovely to have a video game movie that’s actually entertaining and enjoyable in a non-ironic way, but can the film rake in good reviews and big box office returns? The gang at Box Office Pro has offered up their analysis.

Box Office Pro offers global box office data, forecasts, and analysis of key movie-industry trends. Their a team that does this for a living, so their outlooks should definitely give some sort of insight into what lies ahead for Detective Pikachu. Check out the tidbits from their report below.

- Opening Weekend Range: $75 million+
- prospective $250 million USD gross overall
- social media buzz has been spectacular, breaking Box Office Pros’ Twitter tracking record with 400,000+ mentions on day 1
- Ryan Reynolds’ voice presence could further bolster appeal to the curious and uninitiated audiences
- opening in the third weekend of Avengers: Endgame and two weeks before Aladdin could give it breathing room

title: Detective Pikachu Personal de efectos visuales evaluó a Danny Devito como referencia de voz #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Película
body:
Detective Pikachu Personal de efectos visuales evaluó a Danny Devito como referencia de voz #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Película

Cuando el lanzamiento en Norteamérica de Nintendo ‘s detective Pikachu se anunció videojuego, un montón de aficionados especula que el actor perfecto para el trabajo. El personaje de Pokémon es icónico, pero su papel en el juego es significativamente diferente al compañero de Ash de la serie de anime y juego principal. Los fanáticos juntaron sus cabezas y se formó una campaña para convencer al…
